name: Xcode
description: Build an Xcode workspace on Mac OS
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: xcWorkspacePath
inputs.label: Workspace Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root where xcworkspace folder exists.

inputs.name: scheme
inputs.label: Scheme
inputs.helpMarkDown: Scheme name in Xcode.  *Must be a shared scheme* (shared checkbox under managed schemes in Xcode)

inputs.name: actions
inputs.label: Actions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Space delimited list of actions.  Valid options are build, clean, test, analyze, and archive.  For example: `build clean` would do a clean build.  See [xcodebuild man page](https://developer.apple.com/library/mac/documentation/Darwin/Reference/ManPages/man1/xcodebuild.1.html)

inputs.name: sdk
inputs.label: SDK
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build an Xcode project or workspace against the specified SDK.  Run **xcodebuild -showsdks** to see the valid list of SDKs.

inputs.name: outputPattern
inputs.label: Output
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path where build output (binaries) will be placed.
